structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT

law.catch_line: Future review of local business tax rates.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-172.3. Future review of local business tax rates.
Two (2) years after adoption of this article [Ordinance No. 95-109] and every other year thereafter, the County Commission may review and consider the local business taxes established pursuant to this article and may amend them to the extent permitted by ยง 205.0535(4), Florida Statutes.
